tcc_settings.club_slogan: The Creativity with the topping of Code.

index.news_pickup_area_description: You can know more about our club here. See the recent news!
index.advisor_words:
Welcome to the Wenzhou-Kean University Computer Club
====

The computer club stands as a dynamic platform tailored for students eager to partake in technological pursuits and cultivate and refine their skills through the mutual exchange of ideas. With a fervent commitment to fostering an environment of innovation, the club seeks to kindle the flames of creativity in every participant, encouraging them to improve their existing concepts and craft new ones daringly. Through collaborative brainstorming sessions, workshops, and interactive discussions, the club aspires to be the crucible in which raw ideas evolve into refined projects, igniting a passion for excellence that resonates throughout the student body.
index.how_to_join:
Step
====
To join the club, you only need to join our group,
and fill the application form.

Or you can join our annualy recruitment meeting to get more information.
